transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haanji sir, namaskar. Woh main ye keh rahi thi ki video meet pe discussion ho sakta hai kya? Aapka jo bhi concern hai mujhe woh raise bhi karna tha. Toh main over the video meet hi kar deti hu.
Customer: Call kar lijiye. Aaj toh nahi ho payega.
Executive: Sir aapko woh sir phone se hi join karna tha. Kyunki dekho aapne jo concern raise kiya na customer care pe call karke mujhe woh bhi close karna hi hai actually na. Is wajah se.
Customer: Achha toh aaj toh nahi ho payega. Kal karna hai.
Executive: Toh ek kaam kar sakte hai kya? Ye jo bhi aapka concern hai main isko abhi close kar deti hu. Aap fir hum dobara kal ek baar video meet pe connect karke main aapka concern raise karwa dungi internal team ke saath.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Toh aapke paas mail pe feedback aayega sir, satisfied wala jo pehle bhi aapne diya hai na. Toh main concern close kar du na tab tak ke liye. Koi bhi problem aayi aap toh mujhe call kar hi loge. Aapke paas mera number toh hai hi waise bhi.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai. Aapka number toh mujhe nahi mil raha hai. Thoda ek baar hi kar dijiye toh whatsapp pe.
Executive: Achha chalo abhi kar deti hu sir. Main aapko hi karke message kar de rahi hu. Theek hai? Koi bhi dikkat aaye aap mujhe ispe call kar lijiye. Aur kal main aapko video meet ke liye connect karungi. Toh video meet pe connect kar lijiyega. Kyunki usme kya hai fir main over the video meet pe aapka concern raise kar dungi same time pe. Theek hai? Toh abhi main aapka concern close kar rahi hu. Aapko mail pe mere pe feedback aayega. Theek hai? Uspe satisfied de dijiyega sir.

Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Aur kal kitne baje call karoge fir sir?
Customer: A kal main call kar leta hu aapko.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai. Jaise aapko time mile aap mujhe kal call kar lijiyega.

Executive: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discuss on video meet.

- Customer does not have executive's number.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the concern temporarily.

- Executive agreed to send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to connect on video meet tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Customer will call the executive tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, whatsapp, feedback, concern
